text: \--> }} The 2015 Copenhagen attacks were two spree shootings in Copenhagen, Denmark, starting in the afternoon of 14 February 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:2010s in Denmark Category:21st century in Copenhagen Category:February 2015 events Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Europe Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in the 2010s Category:2015 murders in Europe Category:Murders by firearm in Europe Category:Terrorist incidents in Europe in 2015
title: 2015 Copenhagen shootings
